output.analysis:
Let's analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. Has CMF - Yes, the post ends with "CMF 11240017" which indicates it's electoral propaganda
2. Refers to candidate - Yes, mentions "premierul Marcel Ciolacu" who is a presidential candidate
3. Addresses wide population - Yes, this is a paid Facebook/Instagram post targeting between 100,001-500,000 people, specifically addressing young families and broader social issues
4. Electoral objective - Yes, while it discusses social policies, it's clearly promoting PSD and Marcel Ciolacu's vision and leadership, with official PSD hashtags (#caleasigurăpentruromânia)
5. Journalism - No, this is clearly a promotional message from a PSD deputy, not journalistic content
6. Personal opinion - No, this is an official paid political message with CMF number, not a personal opinion
The post continues to promote electoral messages after the conclusion of the presidential campaign period (which ended on November 23rd at 7:00). The spending suggests active promotion (200-299 RON) with significant reach (5,000-5,999 impressions).

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - Contains official CMF number - Directly promotes PSD and Marcel Ciolacu - Is a paid advertisement reaching a wide audience - Uses official party hashtags and messaging - Promotes political agenda and policies
conclusion.message-for-police: Infomed Pro SRL, pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin promovarea unui mesaj de propaganda electorala (ID Facebook: 1839933430165436) dupa ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, in favoarea candidatului ION-MARCEL CIOLACU. Materialul include numar CMF (11240017), promoveaza explicit candidatul si partidul sau prin referinte directe, hashtag-uri oficiale ale partidului (#caleasigurăpentruromânia), si prezinta un mesaj electoral explicit care influenteaza alegatorii. Reclama este platita si activa, cu un buget intre 200-299 RON si o audienta estimata intre 100,001-500,000 persoane.
